action.description: The recommendation of the committee(s) on HWN is to ADVISE AND CONSENT to the nomination(s).  The votes in HWN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Richards, San Buenaventura, Keohokalole, DeCorte; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
